messages.title: Want to give our NHS the support it needs?
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats are the only party with a fully costed plan to give our NHS the full investment it needs to survive. By raising tax by just one penny the Lib Dems will give our doctors and nurses £6 billion extra each year to protect our vital health services. This is your one chance to change the direction of the country - and get a positive future for our NHS.

messages.title: Too weak and too divided to stand up for us
messages.content: Jeremy Corbyn is one of the worst-performing leaders we've had in decades. Corbyn’s shambolic Labour are not able to stand up to Theresa May.

messages.title: The choice in this election is clear:
messages.content: CHANGE BRITAIN’S FUTURE WITH THE LIB DEMS OR MORE DIVISION, WEAKNESS & FAILURE WITH CORBYN'S LABOUR.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats plan an extra £6 billion for the NHS by raising income tax by one penny.

issues.health: The Liberal Democrats propose to raise income tax by one penny to provide the NHS with an extra £6 billion annually.

quotes.text: Jeremy Corbyn is one of the worst-performing leaders we've had in decades.
We cannot fight and win with Jeremy as our leader.
Labour is not a functioning opposition, leaving Theresa May free to act as she pleases.
Labour is resigned to oblivion as Jeremy Corbyn is too weak to lead.
Nurses will see their pay cut by 12% over a decade.
Schools face the worst funding cuts in 20 years
Corbyn is leader of the opposition in name only

images.caption: Lib Dems plan extra £6billion for our NHS.
